name: stock-analysis-app
description: Stock Analysis Application with React Frontend and Node.js Backend

scripts.start: cd backend && npm install && npm start
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-deps: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
